00010       DX9RenderSystem::~DX9RenderSystem( )
00011       {
00012             if( m2dMat ) {
00013                   delete m2dMat;
00014                   m2dMat = 0;
00015             }
00016             if( m2dDecl ) {
00017                   delete m2dDecl;
00018                   m2dDecl = 0;
00019             }
00020             if( mDevice ) {
00021                   mDevice->Release( );
00022                   mDevice = 0;
00023             }
00024             if( mD3d ) {
00025                   mD3d->Release( );
00026                   mD3d = 0;
00027             }
00028       };

00030       bool DX9RenderSystem::Init( HWND hwnd, int width, int height, bool fullscreen, int msquality )
00031       {
00032             mSize.x = width;
00033             mSize.y = height;
00034 
00035             mD3d = Direct3DCreate9( D3D_SDK_VERSION );
00036 
00037             D3DPRESENT_PARAMETERS pp = { 0 };
00038             pp.SwapEffect = D3DSWAPEFFECT_DISCARD;
00039             pp.EnableAutoDepthStencil = TRUE;
00040             pp.AutoDepthStencilFormat = D3DFMT_D24X8;
00041             pp.PresentationInterval = D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_IMMEDIATE;
00042 
00043             if( msquality >= 0 )
00044             {
00045                   pp.MultiSampleType = D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONMASKABLE;
00046                   pp.MultiSampleQuality = msquality;
00047             }
00048 
00049             if( fullscreen )
00050             {
00051                   pp.Windowed = false;
00052                   pp.BackBufferCount = 1;
00053                   pp.BackBufferWidth = width;
00054                   pp.BackBufferHeight = height;
00055                   pp.BackBufferFormat = D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8;
00056             }
00057             else
00058             {
00059                   D3DDISPLAYMODE currentmode;
00060                   if( FAILED(mD3d->GetAdapterDisplayMode( D3DADAPTER_DEFAULT, &currentmode )) )
00061                         return false;
00062 
00063                   // Set up windowed formatting
00064                   pp.Windowed = true;
00065                   pp.BackBufferCount = 1;
00066                   pp.BackBufferFormat = currentmode.Format;
00067             }
00068 
00069             UINT adapterid = D3DADAPTER_DEFAULT;      
00070             D3DDEVTYPE rendertype = D3DDEVTYPE_HAL;
00071 
00072             int adaptercount = (int)mD3d->GetAdapterCount( );
00073             for( int i = 0; i < adaptercount; i++ )
00074             {
00075                   D3DADAPTER_IDENTIFIER9 info;
00076                   mD3d->GetAdapterIdentifier( i, 0, &info );
00077                   
00078                   if( strstr( info.Description, "PerfHUD" ) )
00079                   {
00080                         adapterid = i;
00081                         rendertype = D3DDEVTYPE_REF;
00082                         printf( "PerfHUD found on adapter %d (%s)\n", i, info.Description );
00083                   }
00084             }
00085 
00086             if( FAILED(mD3d->CreateDevice( adapterid, rendertype, hwnd,
00087                   D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING, &pp, &mDevice )) )
00088                   return false;
00089 
00090             for( int i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00091                   mDevice->SetSamplerState( i, D3DSAMP_MAGFILTER, D3DTEXF_ANISOTROPIC );
00092 
00093             // Initialize 2d Rendering Stuff
00094             m2dDecl = new VertexDeclaration( );
00095             m2dDecl->AddElement( VertexElement( 0, VDeclSemantic::POSITION, VDeclType::FLOAT3, 0 ) );
00096             m2dDecl->AddElement( VertexElement( 0, VDeclSemantic::TEXCOORD, VDeclType::FLOAT2, 0 ) );
00097             m2dDecl->AddElement( VertexElement( 0, VDeclSemantic::COLOUR, VDeclType::COLOUR, 0 ) );
00098 
00099             m2dMat = new Material( );
00100             m2dMat->mAlphaBlend = true;
00101             m2dMat->mAlphaTest = true;
00102             m2dMat->mDepthWrite = true;
00103             m2dMat->mDepthBuffer = false;
00104             m2dMat->AddTextureStage(
00105                   TextureStage(
00106                         0,
00107                         BlendMode( BlendOp::SELECTARGUMENT1, BlendArg::TEXTURE, BlendArg::DIFFUSE ),
00108                         BlendMode( BlendOp::SELECTARGUMENT1, BlendArg::TEXTURE, BlendArg::DIFFUSE )
00109                   )
00110             );
00111 
00112             return true;
00113       };

00154       bool DX9RenderSystem::Present( )
00155       {
00156             HRESULT pres = mDevice->Present( NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL );
00157             if( pres == D3DERR_DEVICELOST ) {
00158                   return false;
00159             } else if( FAILED(pres) ) {
00160                   return false;
00161             }
00162 
00163             return true;
00164       };

00199       void DX9RenderSystem::SetFillMode( FillMode::FillMode fm )
00200       {
00201             if( fm == FillMode::POINT )
00202                   SetRenderState( D3DRS_FILLMODE, D3DFILL_POINT );
00203             else if( fm == FillMode::WIRE )
00204                   SetRenderState( D3DRS_FILLMODE, D3DFILL_WIREFRAME );
00205             else
00206                   SetRenderState( D3DRS_FILLMODE, D3DFILL_SOLID );
00207       };

00209       void DX9RenderSystem::SetCullMode( CullMode::CullMode cm )
00210       {
00211             if( cm == CullMode::NONE )
00212                   SetRenderState( D3DRS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_NONE );
00213             else if( cm == CullMode::CW )
00214                   SetRenderState( D3DRS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_CW );
00215             else if( cm == CullMode::CCW )
00216                   SetRenderState( D3DRS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_CCW );
00217       };

00263       void DX9RenderSystem::SetTextureStageState( int stageid, TextureState::TextureState state, int value )
00264       {
00265             if( mTextureStateCached[ stageid ][ state ] && mTextureStates[ stageid ][ state ] == value )
00266                   return;
00267             mTextureStateCached[ stageid ][ state ] = true;
00268             mTextureStates[ stageid ][ state ] = value;
00269             mDevice->SetTextureStageState( stageid, (D3DTEXTURESTAGESTATETYPE)state, value );
00270       };

00272       int DX9RenderSystem::SetTexture( int stageid, Texture* tex )
00273       {
00274             if( !tex )
00275                   return 1;
00276 
00277             if( !tex->IsDirty( ) && mTexture[ stageid ] == tex )
00278                   return 0;
00279 
00280             LPDIRECT3DTEXTURE9 dxbuf = GetTextureCache( tex );
00281             
00282             if( dxbuf ) {
00283                   if( !FAILED(mDevice->SetTexture( stageid, dxbuf )) )
00284                   {
00285                         mTexture[ stageid ] = tex;
00286                         return 0;
00287                   }
00288             } else if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE ) {
00289                   return 2;
00290             }
00291             printf( "Failed to set texture\n" );
00292             return 1;
00293       };
00294 
00295       int DX9RenderSystem::SetMaterial( Material* mat )
00296       {
00297             if( mat == 0 )
00298                   return 1;
00299 
00300             int j = 0;
00301             for( std::vector< TextureStage >::iterator i = mat->mTStages.begin( ); i != mat->mTStages.end( ); i++, j++ )
00302             {
00303                   if( SetTexture( j, (*i).texture ) == 2 )
00304                         return 2;
00305 
00306                   if( !(*i).uses_transform ) {
00307                         SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::TEXTURETRANSFORMFLAGS, D3DTTFF_DISABLE );
00308                   } else {
00309                         SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::TEXTURETRANSFORMFLAGS, D3DTTFF_COUNT2 );
00310                         SetTextureMatrix( j, (*i).transform );
00311                   }
00312 
00313                   SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::COLOROP, (*i).colormode.op );
00314                   if( (*i).colormode.op != BlendOp::DISABLE ) {
00315                         SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::COLORARG1, (*i).colormode.arg1 );
00316                         SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::COLORARG2, (*i).colormode.arg2 );
00317                   }
00318                   SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::ALPHAOP, (*i).alphamode.op );
00319                   if( (*i).alphamode.op != BlendOp::DISABLE ) {
00320                         SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::ALPHAARG1, (*i).alphamode.arg1 );
00321                         SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::ALPHAARG2, (*i).alphamode.arg2 );
00322                   }
00323             }
00324             SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::COLOROP, D3DTOP_DISABLE );
00325             SetTextureStageState( j, TextureState::ALPHAOP, D3DTOP_DISABLE );
00326 
00327             SetAlphaBlendEnabled( mat->mAlphaBlend );
00328             SetAlphaTestEnabled( mat->mAlphaTest );
00329             SetDepthWriteEnabled( mat->mDepthWrite );
00330             SetDepthBufferEnabled( mat->mDepthBuffer );
00331             SetSpecularEnabled( mat->mSpecularEnabled );
00332 
00333             return 0;
00334       };
00335 
00336       int DX9RenderSystem::SetVertexDeclaration( VertexDeclaration* vdecl )
00337       {
00338             if( !vdecl->IsDirty( ) && mDecl == vdecl )
00339                   return 0;
00340 
00341             LPDIRECT3DVERTEXDECLARATION9 decl = GetVertexDeclCache( vdecl );
00342 
00343             if( decl ) {
00344                   if( !FAILED(mDevice->SetVertexDeclaration( decl )) )
00345                   {
00346                         mDecl = vdecl;
00347                         return 0;
00348                   }
00349             } else if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE ) {
00350                   return 2;
00351             }
00352             printf( "Failed to set Vertex Declaration\n" );
00353             return 1;
00354       };

00356       int DX9RenderSystem::SetStreamSource( int streamidx, VertexBuffer* buffer, int start )
00357       {
00358             if( !buffer->IsDirty( ) && mVBuffer[ streamidx ] == buffer )
00359                   return 0;
00360 
00361             LPDIRECT3DVERTEXBUFFER9 dxbuf = GetVertexBufferCache( buffer );
00362 
00363             if( dxbuf ) {
00364                   if( !FAILED(mDevice->SetStreamSource( streamidx, dxbuf, 0, buffer->GetStride( ) )) )
00365                   {
00366                         mVBuffer[ streamidx ] = buffer;
00367                         return 0;
00368                   }
00369             } else if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE ) {
00370                   return 2;
00371             }
00372             printf( "Failed to set stream source\n" );
00373             return 1;
00374       };

00438       bool DX9RenderSystem::DrawIndexedPrimitiveUP( PrimitiveType::PrimitiveType type, int vstart, int istart, int vcount, int count, void* vdata, int vstride, void* idata, int istride )
00439       {
00440             D3DFORMAT idf;
00441             if( istride == 2 )
00442                   idf = D3DFMT_INDEX16;
00443             else if( istride == 4 )
00444                   idf = D3DFMT_INDEX32;
00445             else
00446                   return false;
00447 
00448             if( FAILED(mDevice->DrawIndexedPrimitiveUP( (D3DPRIMITIVETYPE)type, vstart, vcount, count, idata, idf, vdata, vstride )) )
00449             {
00450                   printf( "DrawIndexedPrimitiveUP failed\n" );
00451                   return false;
00452             }
00453 
00454             mBatchCount++;
00455             mPrimCount += count;
00456 
00457             return true;
00458       };

00460       bool DX9RenderSystem::Begin2d( )
00461       {
00462             SetCullMode( CullMode::NONE );
00463             SetFillMode( FillMode::SOLID );
00464             SetProjectionMatrix( Matrix4::CreateOrthoLH( (float)mSize.x, -(float)mSize.y, 0.0f, 1.0f ) );
00465             SetViewMatrix( Matrix4::IDENTITY );
00466             SetWorldMatrix( Matrix4::IDENTITY );
00467             SetVertexDeclaration( m2dDecl );
00468 
00469             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::TEXTURETRANSFORMFLAGS, D3DTTFF_DISABLE );
00470             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::COLOROP, BlendOp::MODULATE );
00471             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::COLORARG1, BlendArg::TEXTURE );
00472             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::COLORARG2, BlendArg::DIFFUSE );
00473             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::ALPHAOP, BlendOp::MODULATE );
00474             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::ALPHAARG1, BlendArg::TEXTURE );
00475             SetTextureStageState( 0, TextureState::ALPHAARG2, BlendArg::DIFFUSE );
00476             SetTextureStageState( 1, TextureState::COLOROP, BlendOp::DISABLE );
00477             SetTextureStageState( 1, TextureState::ALPHAOP, BlendOp::DISABLE );
00478             SetAlphaBlendEnabled( true );
00479             SetAlphaTestEnabled( false );
00480             SetDepthWriteEnabled( true );
00481             SetDepthBufferEnabled( false );
00482             SetSpecularEnabled( false );
00483 
00484             return true;
00485       };
00486 
00487       bool DX9RenderSystem::DrawSprite( int x, int y, int sx, int sy, int tx, int ty, int tsx, int tsy, Texture* tex, unsigned int color )
00488       {
00489             // Get the place on the screen
00490             float fx = (float)(x) - (float)mSize.x / 2 - 0.5f;
00491             float fy = (float)(y) - (float)mSize.y / 2 - 0.5f;
00492 
00493             // Get the width for the screen
00494             float fsx = (float)sx;// / (float)mSize.x;
00495             float fsy = (float)sy;// / (float)mSize.y;
00496 
00497             // Get the place for the TextureBase
00498             float ftx = (float)tx / (float)tex->GetWidth( );
00499             float fty = (float)ty / (float)tex->GetHeight( );
00500 
00501             // Get the width for the TextureBase
00502             float ftsx = (float)tsx / (float)tex->GetWidth( );
00503             float ftsy = (float)tsy / (float)tex->GetHeight( );
00504 
00505             struct VertDef { Vector3 pos; Vector2 uv; unsigned int color; } verts[] =
00506             {
00507                   { Vector3( fx, fy, 1 ), Vector2( ftx, fty ), color },
00508                   { Vector3( fx, fy+fsy, 1 ), Vector2( ftx, fty+ftsy ), color },
00509                   { Vector3( fx+fsx, fy, 1 ), Vector2( ftx+ftsx, fty ), color },
00510                   { Vector3( fx+fsx, fy+fsy, 1 ), Vector2( ftx+ftsx, fty+ftsy ), color }
00511             };
00512 
00513             SetTexture( 0, tex );
00514             DrawPrimitiveUP( PrimitiveType::TriangleStrip, 2, &verts, sizeof( VertDef ) );
00515 
00516             return true;
00517       };
00518 
00519       void DX9RenderSystem::SetRenderState( D3DRENDERSTATETYPE state, unsigned int value )
00520       {
00521             if( mRenderStateCached[ state ] && mRenderStates[ state ] == value )
00522                   return;
00523             mRenderStateCached[ state ] = true;
00524             mRenderStates[ state ] = value;
00525             mDevice->SetRenderState( state, value );
00526       };

00528       LPDIRECT3DVERTEXBUFFER9 DX9RenderSystem::GetVertexBufferCache( VertexBuffer* vb )
00529       {
00530             VertexBufferRC*& rc = (VertexBufferRC*&)vb->mCache;
00531             if( !rc )
00532                   rc = new VertexBufferRC( );
00533 
00534             if( vb->IsDirty( ) )
00535             {
00536                   if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE )
00537                         return 0;
00538                   mCacheCount += 1;
00539 
00540                   if( FAILED(mDevice->CreateVertexBuffer( vb->GetBufferSize( ), D3DUSAGE_WRITEONLY, 0, D3DPOOL_DEFAULT, &rc->mData, 0 )) )
00541                   {
00542                         printf( "Failed to create Vertex Buffer Cache\n" );
00543                         return 0;
00544                   }
00545 
00546                   if( rc->mData )
00547                   {
00548                         void* buf;
00549                         if( FAILED(rc->mData->Lock( 0, 0, &buf, 0 )) )
00550                               return 0;
00551                         memcpy( buf, vb->GetBuffer( ), vb->GetBufferSize( ) );
00552                         if( FAILED(rc->mData->Unlock( )) )
00553                               return 0;
00554                         vb->SetDirty( false );
00555                   }
00556             }
00557             return rc->mData;
00558       };
00559 
00560       LPDIRECT3DINDEXBUFFER9 DX9RenderSystem::GetIndexBufferCache( IndexBuffer* ib )
00561       {
00562             IndexBufferRC*& rc = (IndexBufferRC*&)ib->mCache;
00563             if( !rc )
00564                   rc = new IndexBufferRC( );
00565 
00566             if( ib->IsDirty( ) )
00567             {
00568                   if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE )
00569                         return 0;
00570                   mCacheCount += 1;
00571 
00572                   if( FAILED(mDevice->CreateIndexBuffer( ib->GetBufferSize( ), D3DUSAGE_WRITEONLY, D3DFMT_INDEX16, D3DPOOL_DEFAULT, &rc->mData, 0 )) )
00573                   {
00574                         printf( "Failed to create Index Buffer Cache\n" );
00575                         return 0;
00576                   }
00577 
00578                   if( rc->mData )
00579                   {
00580                         void* buf;
00581                         if( FAILED(rc->mData->Lock( 0, 0, &buf, 0 )) )
00582                               return 0;
00583                         memcpy( buf, ib->GetBuffer( ), ib->GetBufferSize( ) );
00584                         if( FAILED(rc->mData->Unlock( )) )
00585                               return 0;
00586                         ib->SetDirty( false );
00587                   }
00588             }
00589             return rc->mData;
00590       };
00591 
00592       LPDIRECT3DTEXTURE9 DX9RenderSystem::GetTextureCache( Texture* tex )
00593       {
00594             TextureRC*& rc = (TextureRC*&)tex->mCache;
00595             if( !rc )
00596                   rc = new TextureRC( );
00597 
00598             if( tex->IsDirty( ) )
00599             {
00600                   if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE )
00601                         return 0;
00602                   mCacheCount++;
00603 
00604                   if( FAILED(D3DXCreateTexture( mDevice, tex->GetWidth( ), tex->GetHeight( ), 1, D3DUSAGE_DYNAMIC, (D3DFORMAT)tex->GetFormat( ), D3DPOOL_DEFAULT, &rc->mData )) )
00605                   {
00606                         printf( "Failed to create Texture Cache :: Couldn't create surface\n" );
00607                         return 0;
00608                   }
00609 
00610                   LPDIRECT3DSURFACE9 surf;
00611                   rc->mData->GetSurfaceLevel( 0, &surf );
00612                   D3DLOCKED_RECT rect;
00613                   surf->LockRect( &rect, 0, 0 );
00614                   char* data = (char*)rect.pBits;
00615                   memcpy( data, tex->GetBuffer( ), tex->GetBufferSize( ) );
00616                   surf->UnlockRect( );
00617 
00618                   D3DXSaveTextureToFile( "c:\\texdebug.png", D3DXIFF_PNG, rc->mData, 0 );
00619 
00620                   tex->SetDirty( false );
00621             }
00622             return rc->mData;
00623       };
00624 
00625       LPDIRECT3DVERTEXDECLARATION9 DX9RenderSystem::GetVertexDeclCache( VertexDeclaration* decl )
00626       {
00627             VertexDeclarationRC*& rc = (VertexDeclarationRC*&)decl->mCache;
00628             if( !rc )
00629                   rc = new VertexDeclarationRC( );
00630 
00631             if( decl->IsDirty( ) )
00632             {
00633                   if( mCacheCount >= DX9MAXFRAMECACHE )
00634                         return 0;
00635                   mCacheCount += 1;
00636 
00637                   // Generate Declaration
00638                   std::vector< D3DVERTEXELEMENT9 > elems;
00639                   int offset = 0;
00640                   for( std::vector< VertexElement >::iterator i = decl->mElements.begin( ); i != decl->mElements.end( ); i++ )
00641                   {
00642                         D3DVERTEXELEMENT9 elem = { (*i).streamidx, offset, (*i).type, D3DDECLMETHOD_DEFAULT, (*i).semantic, (*i).usageidx };
00643                         elems.push_back( elem );
00644                         offset += VDeclType::LENGTH[ (*i).type ];
00645                   }
00646                   D3DVERTEXELEMENT9 lastelem = D3DDECL_END();
00647                   elems.push_back( lastelem );
00648 
00649                   if( FAILED(mDevice->CreateVertexDeclaration( &elems[0], &rc->mData )) )
00650                   {
00651                         printf( "Failed to create Vertex Declaration Cache\n" );
00652                         return 0;
00653                   }
00654 
00655                   decl->SetDirty( false );
00656             }
00657 
00658             return rc->mData;
00659       };
00660 
00661       D3DXMATRIX* DX9RenderSystem::GetDXMatrix( const Matrix4& mat )
00662       {
00663             return (D3DXMATRIX*)&mat;
00664       };
00665 
00666       void DX9RenderSystem::ResetStates( )
00667       {
00668             for( int i = 0; i < 256; i++ )
00669                   mRenderStateCached[i] = false;
00670             for( int i = 8; i < 8; i++ )
00671                   for( int j = 0; j < 36; j++ )
00672                         mTextureStateCached[i][j] = false;
00673             mDecl = 0;
00674             for( int i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00675                   mVBuffer[i] = 0;
00676             mIBuffer = 0;
00677             for( int i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00678                   mTexture[i] = 0;
00679       };
00680 };
